name: Kayn
title: the Shadow Reaper
lore: A peerless practitioner of lethal shadow magic, Shieda Kayn battles to achieve his true destiny—to one day lead the Order of Shadow into a new era of Ionian supremacy. He wields the sentient darkin weapon Rhaast, undeterred by its creeping corruption of his body and mind. There are only two possible outcomes: either Kayn bends the weapon to his will... or the malevolent blade consumes him completely, paving the way for the destruction of all Runeterra.
blurb: A peerless practitioner of lethal shadow magic, Shieda Kayn battles to achieve his true destiny—to one day lead the Order of Shadow into a new era of Ionian supremacy. He wields the sentient darkin weapon Rhaast, undeterred by its creeping corruption of...
allytips: Look at the line-up of both your team and the enemy's team when picking your form.
Remember that nearby enemies can see which wall you're in.
enemytips: Umbral Trespass requires Kayn to damage a target first. Try to dodge Blade's Reach to deny him a long range cast of Umbral Trespass.
When Kayn is in terrain near you, you will get a visual warning on the edge of the terrain he's in.
Damage Kayn while he's in Shadow Step to shorten its duration, or apply hard crowd control (stun, charm, knockup, etc) to end Shadow Step immediately.

riot_spell_q.name: Reaping Slash
riot_spell_q.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.
Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.

Deals {{ e6 }} bonus physical damage to monsters.

riot_spell_w.name: Blade's Reach
riot_spell_w.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Kayn deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.
Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach.

Darkin: Gain a knock up.

riot_spell_e.name: Shadow Step
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Kayn gains {{ e1 }}% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for {{ e2 }} seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Shadow Assassin: Cooldown is set to {{ assassincdreduction }} seconds, gain more movement speed, and slow immunity.

Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: {{ e6 }} seconds.
Immobilizing effects and spending more than {{ e3 }} consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.

riot_spell_r.name: Umbral Trespass
riot_spell_r.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged, becoming untargetable for up to {{ infestduration }} seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes {{ damage }} physical damage.
Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range (both when entering and exiting Kayn's victim) and refreshes The Darkin Scythe on exit.

Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.

riot_spell_i.name: The Darkin Scythe
riot_spell_i.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

wikia_skill_i1.name: The Darkin Scythe
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''{{ci|Kayn}}''' wields an ancient, [[Darkin|sentient weapon]], that battles with him for control. Each instance of damage '''Kayn''' deals against champions (excluding [[damage over time]]) and {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} causes them to drop orbs, red by {{tip|melee}} champions and blue by {{tip|ranged}} champions, that are automatically collected upon leaving combat, {{tt|filling a bar|Additional info in the notes below}} around '''Kayn's''' portrait.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Once the bar is filled, '''Kayn''' can either return to the [[Spawn|summoning platform]] to interact with his portrait to either be overwhelmed by {{ci|Rhaast}} or expel him to become the {{ci|Shadow Assassin}}, or wait 4 minutes until the other form becomes available, reduced by 5 seconds for each collected orb of their type after that.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: The transformation type is decided based on the highest amount of damage dealt to the respective range type. If the two forms are within 8% of each other, the last champion range type hit will determine the transformation. The transformation will permanently change his abilities and grant him [[Homeguard]].
wikia_skill_i1.description4: {{sbc|{{ci|Shadow Assassin}}:}} '''Kayn''' deals {{pp|key=%|12 to 44}} of post-mitigation [[damage]] dealt against enemy champions as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering in combat with an enemy [[champion]], refreshing after 8 seconds out-of-combat with them or by using {{ai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description5: {{sbc|{{ci|Rhaast}}:}} '''Rhaast''' {{tip|heals}} for {{pp|key=%|34.5 to 43}} of the post-mitigation {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} that he deals with abilities against enemy champions.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The bar gets filled up completely at 500 points. ** ''Melee'' orbs grant 2 points per hit and 6 points per takedown. ** ''Ranged'' orbs grant 3 points per hit and 7 points per takedown. ** Each bar has a bucket system. *** The bucket starts at 60 points. *** Each time an orb is taken the system checks if there's an amount of points in the bucket equal to or higher than the amount received from the orb.
If there is, '''Kayn''' is given an additional orb of the same type he received, while also subtracting that amount of points from the bucket. *** The bucket fills by {{fd|0.8}} points per second if out of champion combat for 70 seconds. ** The amount of points received per orb is then multiplied by {{pp|3|type=minutes|3;6;10|0:00; 8:20; 12:30}}. * The orbs will be collected even if '''Kayn''' dies.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Reaping Slash
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayn''' {{tip|dashes}} forward, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through, before swinging his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Non-Monster Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Both instances of ''Reaping Slash'' deal 55 '''bonus''' damage against monsters.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2: {{st|Monster Physical Damage|{{ap|60+55 to 140+55}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Monster Damage|{{ap|(60+55)*2 to (140+55)*2}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description3: {{sbc|{{ci|Rhaast}}:}} ''Reaping Slash's'' damage is modified to deal {{as|50% AD}} {{as|(+ 5% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} for both instances. This damage is {{tt|capped against monsters|This includes the 55 bonus damage to monsters.}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling3: {{st|Max. Monster Damage per Hit|{{ap|200 to 400}}|Total Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|200*2 to 400*2}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description4: The dash's speed scales with '''Kayn's''' {{sti|ms|{{as|'''total''' movement speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the dash or the slash.
* As {{ci|Shadow Assassin}}, an alternate icon for {{ai|Reaping Slash A|Kayn|Reaping Slash}} is used but has no modified effect.
* Other abilities can be queued while casting ''Reaping Slash''.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Blade's Reach
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a short delay in which he cannot perform any other actions, '''Kayn''' performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line in the target direction and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% decaying over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|{{ci|Shadow Assassin}}:}} ''Blade's Reach's'' [[range]] is increased by 200. Additionally, '''Kayn''' conjures a ''living shadow'' at the casting position to perform ''Blade's Reach'' in his stead, allowing '''Kayn''' to perform other actions.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * The ''shadow'' created by the '''Shadow Assassin''' can grab the {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and is considered a champion for {{tip|Turret Plating|Turret Plating's}} {{g|gold}} sharing.

wikia_skill_w2.name: Blade's Reach
wikia_skill_w2.blurb: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
wikia_skill_w2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a short delay in which he cannot perform any other actions, '''Kayn''' performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line in the target direction and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% decaying over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w2.description2: {{sbc|{{ci|Shadow Assassin}}:}} ''Blade's Reach's'' [[range]] is increased by 200. Additionally, '''Kayn''' conjures a ''living shadow'' at the casting position to perform ''Blade's Reach'' in his stead, allowing '''Kayn''' to perform other actions.
wikia_skill_w2.notes: * The ''shadow'' created by the '''Shadow Assassin''' can grab the {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and is considered a champion for {{tip|Turret Plating|Turret Plating's}} {{g|gold}} sharing.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Shadow Step
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayn''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, is {{tip|ghosted}} and can ignore terrain collision for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. [[Crowd control#Movement|Immobilizing]] effects will interrupt ''Shadow Step''.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: '''Kayn''' {{tip|heals}} himself upon moving through terrain for the first time and, if he's not in combat with enemy champions, ''Shadow Step's'' duration is increased. While inside terrain, '''Kayn's''' vision pierces all obstructions although cannot see into [[brush]].
wikia_skill_e1.description3: Receiving damage from an enemy champion or dealing ability damage to them after the effect is enhanced reduces the remaining duration to {{fd|1.5}} seconds. The effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than {{fd|1.5}} seconds and will cancel completely if '''Kayn''' basic attacks.
wikia_skill_e1.description4: {{sbc|{{ci|Shadow Assassin}}:}} ''Shadow Step's'' cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Casting ''Shadow Step'' removes {{tip|slow|slows}} and makes '''Kayn''' [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to them for the duration. Additionally, entering terrain will increase the {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} to {{as|80%|ms}} for the remaining duration.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* As {{ci|Rhaast}}, an alternate icon for {{ai|Shadow Step R|Kayn|Shadow Step}} is used but has no modified effect.
* Unblocked vision allows '''Kayn''' to see the full circle of his vision radius, with the exception of within brush. Note that despite not being able to see into brush, he can still see things beyond the brush.
* Effects such as {{cai|Condemn|Vayne}} and {{cai|Heroic Charge|Poppy}} apply an immobilizing effect and so interrupt Shadow Step.
* Enemies cannot see {{ci|Kayn}} while he is inside of terrain unless they have terrain-piercing vision, such as {{ai|Heightened Senses|Quinn}}, {{ai|Hawkshot|Ashe}} or {{ai|Comet of Legend|Aurelion Sol}}.
** However, enemies will be notified if nearby terrain is infested if '''Kayn''' is within 1000 units - with an indicator being placed on the terrain with a direct line between '''Kayn''' and the enemy champion. ''Slightly less than standard sight radius, but more than the {{tip|Camouflage}} detection radius.''
* While moving in terrain, '''Kayn''' is considered [[dash|dashing]], so {{tip|knockdown}} effects would stop him from moving.
* '''Kayn''' can move up to 550 units beyond the outer-edge of the battlefield.
* While in terrain, '''Kayn''' will '''not''' be considered unseen for the sake of {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Umbral Trespass
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayn''' marks enemy champions he damaged in the last {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayn''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|dash|infests}} a marked enemy champion for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, {{tip|true sight|revealing them}} for the duration. Reactivating ''Umbral Trespass'' ends it earlier.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Upon reactivation or at the end of the duration, '''Kayn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} out from their body 300-units away in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the target.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: {{sbc|{{ci|Shadow Assassin}}:}} ''Umbral Trespass'' gains up to 200 '''bonus''' cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset {{ai|The Darkin Scythe A|Kayn|The Darkin Scythe's}} {{sti|cooldown}}.
wikia_skill_r1.description5: {{sbc|{{ci|Rhaast}}:}} ''Umbral Trespass'' is modified to deal {{as|10% {{as|(+ 13% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|heals}} him for{{ft|70% of the pre-mitigation damage|{{as|7% {{as|(+ {{fd|9.1}}% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* As {{ci|Rhaast}}, an alternate icon is used for the initial activation of {{ai|Umbral Trespass R|Kayn|Umbral Trespass}}.
* Until the second cast, the ability will have had no effect on the target for the purposes of {{ri|Electrocute}} or the 'in-combat' status.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will prevent '''Kayn''' from infesting the target, but will do nothing to mitigate the damage once he has already infested them.
** If '''Kayn''' targets an enemy with a spell shield, the ability will simply go on cooldown without making '''Kayn''' dash to his target.
* '''Kayn''' is not able to target {{ci|Fiora}} during her {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}.
* The damage is '''not''' blocked if the target is untargetable.

wikia_champ.title: the Shadow Reaper
wikia_champ.skill_i: The Darkin Scythe;The Darkin Scythe A;The Darkin Scythe R
